use_when: Running a Python application from a shell script
preferences: prefers using shell scripts for startup

use_when: Installing a Go application that has pre-built binaries
preferences: prefers using pre-built binaries over compiling from source

tool_sops.action: cd project_directory && ls -la to check for executables

use_when: Installing a Go application from source code
preferences: prefers checking project structure and dependencies before installation

tool_sops.action: ls -la *.go *.mod to check for Go project files

use_when: Installing a Go application from source code
preferences: prefers checking for pre-built binaries before building from source

tool_sops.action: go build . or go run . to build/run Go applications

use_when: Starting a Python Flask web application with environment variables
preferences: prefers using environment variables for configuration

use_when: Starting a Python web application with environment variables
preferences: prefers setting environment variables inline with command execution
